class Towel: #classe
    def __init__(self, color:str, size:str): #construtor
        self.color: str = color #atributo
        self.size: str = size
        self.wetness: int = 0


#referencias
print("qual a cor da sua toalha?")
color= input("")
towel: Towel = Towel(color, "P") #objeto
print(f"Sua toalha é {towel.color}")
